snippet.title: [PS1] Yuuyami Doori Tankentai - journey in twilight Tokyo
snippet.description:
"A harpy stalks the city park when light retreats and night is nigh, its dreadful gaze imprints a curse" or so the rumor goes.

Yuuyami Doori Tankentai is a 1999 sidescrolling adventure from Spike. One of the most unusual and unconventional experiences on any system, it tells a story of a group of curious Japanese teenagers succumbing to the mysterious and alluring world of urban legends and going on an adventure to explore the haunted places and investigate the strange happenings allegedly occurring in the city. 

Spooky moments in the video:
07:30
41:40
